item.title: Eating help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:16, topic:345645”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=442031.msg3247139#msg3247139 date=1277471455]

Did that, Got the exact same error.

Try this:

else if (npcType == 3084) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs.UpdateRequired = true { npcs.textUpdateRequired = true { if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("F 3 A R D")) { npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is online!" } else { npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is offline!" } } } }

That would give 100 errors.
[/quote]

dued what ur doing …

NPCHandler.java:2132: class, interface, or enum expected } else if (npcType == 3084) {

learn to read compiler[/quote]
Again, would give 100 errors because of a missing curly brace.

Read full topic

item.title: Eating help
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

Ok, tried yours supra, still same error. Heres the end of the code leading up to the login one and the current login one:

public void println(String str) {
System.out.println(str);
}
}
else if (npcType == 3084) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs.UpdateRequired = true {
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true {
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”)) {
npcs.textUpdate = “F 3 A R D is online!”
} else {
npcs.textUpdate = “F 3 A R D is offline!”
}
}
}
}

} else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs.UpdateRequired = true { npcs.textUpdateRequired = true { if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("F 3 A R D")) { npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is online!" } else { npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is offline!" } } } }

u can do it like :

case 391: //Manta ray if(actionTimer == 0){ // when timer = 0 you can eat again healing[1] = 25; healing[2] = 25; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = 25 //when you eat, it put ur waiting time to 25 } break;

item.title: Eating help
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

How fast you eat…

This is what I have for manta rays (eating them):
case 391: //Manta ray
healing[1] = 25;
healing[2] = 25;
healing[3] = -1;
break;

THAT has no timer… I need that to have a 2second eating timer, and still heal 25hits. COULD ANYONE HELP?

Read full topic
